questions.question: What trend do Lynda Gratton and Tamara J. Erickson use to argue that collaboration is becoming both harder and more important?
options: Increasing average budgets for data integration projects
Increasing demand on data integration teams

questions.question: Visual Workspace Comparison and Merge is useful for solo workspace authors.
Which of the following is not a valid use case for Visual Workspace Comparison and Merge?
options: Comparing local workspaces and workspaces stored on FME Server.
Collaborating on shared workspaces with colleagues.
Viewing changes to your own personal workspaces over time.
Comparing the performance metrics of different workspaces.
